Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageController

  • public class ImageController
extends java.lang.Object

    Yiu Fung Tsang, Caleb Warburton

        public void buttonCreatePressed()
        Method for adding shapes in the profile image creator. A selected shape is created when the button is pressed.

      • buttonSavePressed

        public void buttonSavePressed()
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Saves the image when the button is pressed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if cannot connect to Database

      • passStageReference

        Parameters:
        window - the window

           throws java.io.IOException
